markdown:
**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 204
  • Change the [human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) trait to [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81).
  • Add [Goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) to the NPC's languages.
  • Add [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Goblin
